name: Aethersails
description: Specialized sails that improve maneuverability or straight-line speed.

name: Arcane Weaponry
description: Converts a ship weapon to use magical firing systems.

name: Assault Port
description: Allows faster deployment from Fighter Bays.

name: Enhanced Weapon
description: Improves a ship weapon's accuracy and range.

name: Gunpowder Station
description: Removes the Loading property from cannons on a specific hardpoint.

name: Helm Link
description: Allows two ships to travel together at jamming speeds.

name: Reinforced Component
description: Doubles the hull points of a weapon, module, or sails.

name: Turreted Hardpoint
description: Allows a hardpoint to rotate, changing the facing of the mounted weapon.
